Transcription for 1896801

My name was a bit of a difficulty because there were various other people whose name began with A and
There was a tendency to pick a name in which both your surname and your Christian name would have the same initials in case
I've embroidered handkerchiefs or what have you
Andrews and Anderson all the obvious A's had already gone
But at that moment an Avro Anson happened to fly overhead
and it struck me as a very
short and agreeable name and not very common name so at that moment I became Anson and the Klaus in my original name became Colin
The middle name of Edward is purely on the spur of the moment because Captain Hilton Jones looked up and said no middle name
I don't have a middle name, it's usual to have a middle name so I simply picked that out of fresh air and that is how Klaus Leopold Octavio Asher was made into Colin Edward Anson
